author: geirm
msg: Added @version@ in the log  - hopefully that will result in fewer
user issues where there is an old jar in the classpath - the log will
Also, and more importantly, removed the pre-init logging mechanism
and moved into 'PrimordialLogSystem' to remove the if() in the log()
method.  Also removed some extra string cats so should be a touch

author: geirm
msg: Primordial : was the 'stuff' that RuntimeInstance did pre-init to catch
log messages.  By having this Primordial logger, we can remove that stuff
from RuntimeInstance, and better, remove the if() to make it a touch
speedier.  Suggested by Carsten and Jeroen (I thinK).
Null : do-nothing logger - created in the event of LogManager failure
to keep things going - also can be used as a bit-bucket logger.

author: geirm
msg: Yecchy bug found by bhl - when you had combinations of <MORE> tokens with
non-references (#$foo where $foo not in context) things would get goofy.
Cleaned up and made separate prefixs for both escapes and <MORE>.
There is another fix coming, but wanted to get this in as a baseline.
Template tests have already been committed.

author: geirm
msg: Additional tests for a case that blh found.  I can't believe this didn't
come up earlier.  Fix follows (want to test against current CVS again,
so putting in test first, then code after.)
